function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unavailability of supportive technological infrastructure, including network connectivity","Impact":"Compounds the challenge that the Smart City concept faces","Mitigation":"Investing in robust network infrastructure and connectivity solutions","Technologies":"5G technology, IoT devices, and advanced networking equipment","People":"Residents, businesses, and city officials","Owner":"Government, private investors, and technology companies"},{"Description":"High implementation costs leading to abandonment or refocusing of the Smart City pursuit","Impact":"Limited adoption and understanding of the Smart City concept in various sectors","Mitigation":"Reducing implementation costs through efficient planning and budget allocation","Technologies":"Cost-effective construction methods, integrated infrastructure design, and sustainable materials","People":"City developers, technology providers, and investors","Owner":"Government, private investors, and urban planners"},{"Description":"Limited wireless communication leading to expensive infrastructural costs","Impact":"Increased financial burden and slower progress in Smart City development","Mitigation":"Investing in advanced wireless communication technologies and infrastructure","Technologies":"5G technology, wireless mesh networks, and satellite communication","People":"Residents, businesses, and city officials","Owner":"Government, private investors, and technology companies"}]}
